games.title: Drakkar Strike
games.description: Sail the seas on your drakkar, launch spears like a furious slingshot, and crush enemy vikings before they sink you!
games.howToPlayText:
Drag to aim your spear & Release to launch.

Hit enemy vikings and sink their ships.
Clear all foes to win!
